Other: Tamil perungayam. There is a saying in Kannada 'ಇಂಗು ತೆಂಗು ಇದ್ದರೆ ಮಂಗನೂ ಅಡಿಗೆ ಮಾಡತ್ತೆ'. This means even a monkey can cook if Asafoetida and coconut is available. Hing is must in Kannada and Marathi brahmin cuisine for sure.
